strings.SM64_BBF_BOBOMB_EXPLODE_JUMP_DESCRIPTION: Jump in the air and start exploding. After 5 seconds explode dealing 500% base damage.
strings.SM64_BBF_BOBOMB_EXPLODE_DESCRIPTION: Start exploding instantly. After 5 seconds explode, dealing 500% base damage.
strings.SM64_BBF_ITEM_1UP_DESCRIPTION: Revives on death. Will disappear on leaving Bob-omb Battlefield.
strings.SM64_BBF_FAMILY_BOBOMB: You smell black powder in the air.
strings.SM64_BBF_ITEM_ROYAL_CROWN_DESCRIPTION: Killing an elite enemy <style=cIsUtility>summons a friendly Bob-omb</style> with the <style=cIsDamage>same elite affix</style> and bonus <style=cIsDamage>0%</style> damage <style=cStack>(+100% per stack)</style>.
